abstract: Catholic Charities, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives $518 to Margaret Macaluso to pay her supplemental medical insurance premiums for two months.
lead_paragraph: Margaret Macaluso’s residence on Long Island was ravaged by two storms, and her ex-husband died in 2013. Then she learned this year she has Stage 3 ovarian cancer. Still, she says she is without stress.

headline.main: A Spirit Unbent Through Loss of Health and Home
headline.print_headline: Spirit Unbent Through Loss of Health and Home
